libraryComponent.name: Datepicker
libraryComponent.title: Datepicker
libraryComponent.shortDescription: Datepicker is a highly configurable component that adds datepicker functionality to your pages. You can customize the date format and Minimum-maximum date range, number of month in datepicker .Want to learn more about the datepicker Check out the

usage.title: TypeScript File
usage.use:
import { DatepickerModule } from './datepicker/datepicker.module';

@NgModule({
  imports: [DatepickerModule]
})

export class AppModule {}

usage.title: HTML File
usage.use: <div dl-datepicker #datepickerDir1=datepickerDirective [dateconfig]="{type:'withButtons', maxDate:365, minDate:0, noOfMonth:3, dateFormat:'dM'}"></div>

usage.title: HTML File
usage.use: <div dl-datepicker #datepickerDir2=datepickerDirective [dateconfig]="{type:'withText', maxDate:365, minDate:0, noOfMonth:1, dateFormat:'dM'}"></div>

usage.title: HTML File
usage.use: <div dl-datepicker #datepickerDir3=datepickerDirective [dateconfig]="{type:'withRange', noOfMonth:2, dateFormat:'dM'}"></div

inputs.description: The number of months to show at once
It describe which type of component need to be loaded

libraryComponent.name: Time Widget
libraryComponent.title: Time Widget
libraryComponent.shortDescription: Time Widget is a lightweight highly configurable component that allows the user to select time in the form. You can customize the time format.

usage.title: TypeScript File
usage.use:
import { TimeModule } from './timewidget/timewidget.module';


@NgModule({
imports: [ TimeModule ]})

export class SharedModule {
}

usage.title: HTML File
usage.use: <div dl-timewidget [type]="'24hrs'"></div>

usage.title: HTML File
usage.use: <div dl-timewidget [type]="'hrsandMin'"></div>

usage.title: HTML File
usage.use: <div dl-timewidget [type]="'basic'"></div>

inputs.description: It describe which type of component need to be loaded

libraryComponent.name: Calculator
libraryComponent.title: Calculator
libraryComponent.shortDescription: This calculator does not use eval(). It converts the mathematical expression to the Reverse Polish Notation using the Shunting-yard algorithm and evaluates it manually.

usage.title: TypeScript File
usage.use:
import { CalculatorModule } from './calculator/calculator.module';

@NgModule({
  imports: [CalculatorModule]
})

export class AppModule {}

usage.title: HTML File
usage.use: <dl-calculator></dl-calculator>

libraryComponent.name: Stack Panel
libraryComponent.title: Stack Panel
libraryComponent.shortDescription: Displays collapsible content panels for presenting information in a limited amount of space. The stackpanel component builds on top of the collapse directive to provide a list of items, with collapsible bodies that are collapsed or expanded by clicking on the item's header.

usage.title: TypeScript File
usage.use:
import { AccordionModule } from 'ngx-bootstrap';

@NgModule({
  imports: [AccordionModule.forRoot(),...]
})
export class AppModule(){}

usage.title: HTML File
usage.use:
<accordion>
        <accordion-group heading="Static Header, initially expanded">
            This content is straight in the template.
        </accordion-group>
        <accordion-group #group>
            <div accordion-heading>
                I can have markup, too!
                <i class="pull-right float-xs-right glyphicon" [ngClass]="{'glyphicon-chevron-down': group?.isOpen, 'glyphicon-chevron-right': !group?.isOpen}"></i>
            </div>
            This is just some content to illustrate fancy headings.
        </accordion-group>
        <accordion-group heading="Content 1">
            <p>Content 1</p>
        </accordion-group>
        <accordion-group heading="Content 2">
            <p>Content 2</p>
        </accordion-group>
    </accordion>

libraryComponent.name: Tool Tip
libraryComponent.title: Tool Tip
libraryComponent.shortDescription: Tooltips are an updated version, which donâ€™t rely on images, use CSS3 for animations, and much more.

usage.title: TypeScript File
usage.use:
import { TooltipModule } from 'ngx-bootstrap';

@NgModule({
  imports: [TooltipModule.forRoot(),...]
})
export class AppModule(){}

usage.title: HTML File
usage.use:
<div>
    <template #popTemplate>Here we go: <div> HTML tooltip</div></template>
    <button type="button" class="btn btn-success" [tooltip]="popTemplate">
  Show me tooltip with html
</button>
</div>

libraryComponent.name: Modal
libraryComponent.title: Modal
libraryComponent.shortDescription: Modals are streamlined, but flexible, dialog prompts with the minimum required functionality and smart defaults.

usage.title: TypeScript File
usage.use:
import { ModalModule } from 'ngx-bootstrap';

@NgModule({
  imports: [ModalModule.forRoot(),...]
})
export class AppModule(){}

usage.title: HTML File
usage.use:
<div>
    <button type="button" class="btn btn-primary" (click)="staticModal.show()">Static modal</button>

    <div class="modal fade" bsModal #staticModal="bs-modal" [config]="{backdrop: 'static'}" tabindex="-1" role="dialog" aria-labelledby="mySmallModalLabel" aria-hidden="true">
        <div class="modal-dialog modal-sm">
            <div class="modal-content">
                <div class="modal-header">
                    <h4 class="modal-title pull-left">Static modal</h4>
                    <button type="button" class="close pull-right" aria-label="Close" (click)="staticModal.hide()">
          <span aria-hidden="true">×</span>
        </button>
                </div>
                <div class="modal-body">
                    This is static modal, backdrop click will not close it. Click <b>×</b> to close modal.
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

usage.title: TypeScript File
usage.use:
import { TypeaheadModule } from 'ngx-bootstrap';

@NgModule({
  imports: [TypeaheadModule.forRoot(),...]
})
export class AppModule(){}

usage.title: HTML File
usage.use:
<input [(ngModel)]="asyncSelected"
         [typeahead]="dataSource"
         (typeaheadLoading)="changeTypeaheadLoading($event)"
         (typeaheadNoResults)="changeTypeaheadNoResults($event)"
         (typeaheadOnSelect)="typeaheadOnSelect($event)"
         typeaheadOptionsLimit="7"
         typeaheadOptionField="name"
         placeholder="Locations loaded with timeout"
         class="form-control">
  <div *ngIf="typeaheadLoading===true">
    <i class="glyphicon glyphicon-refresh ng-hide" style=""></i>
  </div>
  <div *ngIf="typeaheadNoResults===true" class="" style="">
    <i class="glyphicon glyphicon-remove"></i> No Results Found
  </div>

usage.title: HTML File
usage.use:
<fieldset>
        <legend>Search By</legend>
        <div class="col-sm-6">
            <label>Bag Tag: <span>*</span></label>
            <input type="text" />
        </div>
        <div class="col-sm-6">
            <label>Last Name: </label>
            <input type="text" />
        </div>
        <div class="col-sm-12">
            <div class="col-sm-offset-11">
                <button type="button" class="btn btn-default">Search</button>
            </div>
        </div>
</fieldset>
